pkgmetadata.longdescription: Pathmox Approach Segmentation Tree Analysis // It provides an interesting solution for handling a high number of segmentation variables in partial least squares structural equation modeling. The package implements the "Pathmox" algorithm (Lamberti, Sanchez, and Aluja,(2016)doi:10.1002/asmb.2168) including the F-coefficient test (Lamberti, Sanchez, and Aluja,(2017)doi:10.1002/asmb.2270) to detect the path coefficients responsible for the identified differences). The package also allows running the hybrid multi-group approach (Lamberti (2021) doi:10.1007/s11135-021-01096-9).
